channel.title: Pixelmon
channel.description: You guys need to bring in a Pixelmon server. It would bring lots of people in and its so flipping fun! :D

item.title: Pixelmon
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Yolo. Still bumping this. This mod is only getting more popular.

Read full topic

item.title: Pixelmon
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

KroniKz_:

bumping this because I was reading this and wondering why the moparcraft server is so boring. There is no interaction, I can just host a plain hamachi server. Why not do something fun like faction servers or like RiipiiN said, pixelmon. The way the server is right now is the reason why I don’t play on it.

FFS faction servers are all anyone hosts anymore. If you guys do a pixelmon server I’m willing to join and play. I like community stuff so I am more likely to gravitate towards people who want a good resource gatherer around.

Read full topic

item.title: Pixelmon
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The main problem with FTB was the amount of disk I/O it was using, the disk usage forced us to lower the Java processes priority to low so it wouldn’t take the webserver down this means all the minecraft servers suffered in performance when we were hosting FTB. I don’t think we can afford this level of expenditure when there are plans to put other things on the server in a separate VM as well, there just isn’t the resources there to host everything nicely, unfortunately we can’t host every type of server so I think for now it’ll have to be what we have already.

I am considering the options so we can have more servers though, but it’s early days.

Read full topic

item.title: Pixelmon
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie

Well, there would be only one way to find out I guess lol

item.title: Pixelmon
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

omgilikepie:

I miss FTB =/ but if it causes a lot of trouble still then no need to bother with it.

Like Bowser said - FTB no longer has redpower, which was a main cause of lag but still we don’t really know how stable it is.

Read full topic

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:16, topic:535783”][quote author=KroniKz_ link=topic=654591.msg4388866#msg4388866 date=1386721535]

no I haven’t played vanilla

moparcraft server is so boring

Then how can you say this?

why would I want to play Vanilla
[/quote]

I don’t care if you want to play or not but the fact you call it shit when you’ve never played it annos me.[/quote]
I’m sorry that “annos” you! Just playin with you, idk if I were to play a no mod server I would just play singleplayer, theres not really any interaction.

Read full topic

item.title: Pixelmon
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:18, topic:535783”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=654591.msg4384649#msg4384649 date=1384877880]

Not going to happen.
[/quote]And the reason behind that would be? It would be able to pay for itself if you guys set it up properly.

We’ve tried modded servers in the past (FTB) and they didn’t work out well in the long run. There are to many unstable factors you cannot rely on with modded servers.

We should try again. I’m sure some of the worst problems are gone. And without redpower I can’t make my laggy lava pump/mining machines.[/quote]
It’s not for me to decide whether we were to host a modded server again, but I personally wouldn’t advise it. Really it’s up to the admins and if they think it will be worth it/possible to run.

Read full topic
